Package org.mule.transport.http.transformers

Class Summary
HttpClientMethodResponseToObject HttpClientMethodResponseToObject transforms a http client response to a DefaultMuleMessage.
HttpRequestBodyToParamMap  
HttpResponseToString Converts an Http Response object to String.
MuleMessageToHttpResponse Converts a UMOMEssage into an Http response.
ObjectToHttpClientMethodRequest ObjectToHttpClientMethodRequest transforms a MuleMessage into a HttpClient HttpMethod that represents an HttpRequest.
ServletRequestToOutputHandler Adds support for converting a HttpServletRequest into an OutputHandler
